about_the_game:
It seems you have escaped from the place where all living things go and nothing comes back, the border between life and death. Waking up in the house you find an old camera, starting to record all the events, hoping someone will find this record if you can not get out. Leave behind your notes on a typewriter, maybe it will turn into a wonderful story.

Features:
  • Atmospheric original soundtrack
  • Puzzles
  • Gameplay mechanics for full immersion
  • Notes revealing the personalities of all the characters
  • Deep story
  • Record your investigation
  • Play at 4:3 resolution for more realism
  • Always ringing phone, is anybody there?
  • Who is your friend?

Developer's Note:
Who I am: Remedy is a game in the horror-detective genre. Creating this project, I was inspired by a lot of horror games, studied the pros and cons and decided to build that atmosphere, a game that would play with the player, crush, mock and be unpredictable. I made a soundtrack that fully captures the atmosphere of every moment. I just want to put a piece of my soul into this game. The game will ask you questions and give you answers - you have to see, hear and understand them.
